title: [FIP #12] — Vote on whether to implement an FNX buyback-and-burn operation  关于FPO中累积的费用进行FNX市场购买并销毁的提案
body:
[FIP #12] — Vote on whether to implement an FNX buyback-and-burn opteration with the fees accumulated before April 30, 2021
## Proposal Type: 
FNX Fee Distribution
## Governance Rule Version: 
Interim governance rules
## Proposer:
FinNexus Team
## Voting period:
From 2021-04-19 to 2021-04-23
## Proposal:

We currently have some fund obtained from fees accumulated in the FinNexus Protocol of Options (FPO). They can be seen as 'undistributed fees' on the 'mine' page. 

Since the amount would be paltry if directly distributed to FNX stakers, the team is proposing to buy the FNX back and burn it. This would cover the fees accumulated before 2021-4-30.

Please check this [discussion](https://forum.finnexus.io/t/proposal-on-buying-back-and-burning-fnx-with-the-fees-accumulated-in-fpo/148) to find out more.

We kindly invite the community to vote yes or no to this proposal.


# [FIP #12] — 关于FPO中累积的费用进行FNX市场购买并销毁的提案

## 提案类型：
累积费用的分配
## 治理规则版本：
临时治理规则
## 提案者：
FinNexus 团队
## 投票期限：
自 2021-04-19 至 2021-04-23
## 提案内容:
目前，FPO中累积了一些费用，在“挖矿”页面上显示为“未分配手续费”。如果直接分发给FNX抵押用户的话，那将是微不足道的。如[此处](https://forum.finnexus.io/t/proposal-on-buying-back-and-burning-fnx-with-the-fees-accumulated-in-fpo/148)所述，团队提议使用2021年4月30日前累积的费用回购$FNX，并进行销毁。

请进行投票。
author: 0x404d854065f1ba0a3E64b444C67d28aF9F7ff505
